name: Versulf the Grim
aura: Increases Ally HP in All Battles by 33%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Also places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns equal to 10% of their MAX HP.
skills.name: Stern Admonishing
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places an extra hit on enemies under [Stun], [Freeze], [Fear], [True Fear], [Provoke], [Petrification] debuffs. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Reign of Sorrow
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Quality Minions

skills.desc: When hit, has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn. Occurs once per hit.
skills.name: Infectious Fury [P]
